name: Squared - 2.5D Prototype #OSTJam
description:
Explore a lush green environment where pixels and reality have collided! 

Inspired by music provided by #OSTJam. 

This is a smaller project as I didn't have as much time to work on this as I wanted but I hope you like it! The music inspired me to create a dreamy green landscape with 2.5D style! 

Made for OST Jam.

Music Credit

"Cat Planet" By Level 99. 

Follow me on Twitter!

Connect with me on Linkedin !

Follow my development journey over on Instagram!
